t: The Best of the Gear-Drive Sprinklers !!

t: Gear Drive Sprinklers — Ray Padula Lawn and Garden
s: Ray Padula gear drive sprinklers are some of the most innovative sprinklers available today. These sprinklers adjust to any part of a circle while providing the same function of traditional pulsating sprinklers with a silent operation, eliminating traditional "ch-ch-ch" clatter.

t: Gear Drive Sprinklers | Sprinkler School
s: Gear-driven rotors are very silent, rotate smoothly, require lower maintenance, and are smaller in size. Unlike fixed sprinkler heads that operate similarly to a showerhead and are normally used to cover smaller areas, rotors use rotating sprinkler heads to distribute water to the ground via a rotating stream.
